meanings.definition: A colorless liquid alcohol used as a solvent and antiseptic.
meanings.sent1: I cleaned the wound with propanol.
meanings.sent2: The propanol evaporated quickly from the surface.
meanings.sent3: The propanol bottle danced on the shelf, eager to be used.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like the scent of propanol.
meanings.sent5: The propanol sparkled under the bright lights of the lab.

meanings.definition: Any of three isomeric alcohols with the formula C3H7OH.
meanings.sent1: Propanol is commonly used in industrial processes.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of propanol.
meanings.sent3: The propanol molecules chatted happily with each other.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed together like the different forms of propanol.
meanings.sent5: The propanol solutions shimmered in the glass beakers.
